忘.definition: to forget; to overlook; to neglect

忘乎所以.definition: to get carried away; to forget oneself

忘八旦.definition: turtle's egg (highly offensive when directed at sb)

忘八蛋.definition: turtle's egg (highly offensive when directed at sb)

忘其所以.definition: see 忘乎所以[wang4 hu1 suo3 yi3]

忘年交.definition: friends despite the difference in age

忘恩負義.definition: to forget favors and violate justice (idiom); ingratitude to a friend; to kick a benefactor in the teeth

忘機.definition: free of worldly concerns; above the fray; at peace with the world

忘詞.definition: (of a singer, actor etc) to forget one's lines

忘餐廢寢.definition: see 廢寢忘食|废寝忘食[fei4qin3-wang4shi2]
